item.title: Charlie Kirk's assassination sparks grief and rage online

item.title: Are hotel rooms accessible for people who use wheelchairs? NPR wants to hear from you
item.description: Hotels have accessible rooms for wheelchair users. If you or someone you know has experienced problems with those rooms, we'd like to hear about it.

item.title: The music industry is broken. OpenWav’s new app aims to change that
item.description: OpenWav is building a direct-to-fan platform for music artists which lets them keep more of the profits.

item.title: Justice Department sues Uber for allegedly discriminating against people with disabilities
item.description: It's the latest in a long line of criticism — and action — against the company's treatment of people with physical disabilities.
